line_1: How sleek their Skins! their Joints how easy!
line_2: There Slovens only are not greasy.

line_1: In case the Thing before was easy.
line_2: And with Remarks and Comments teaze Ye;

line_1: Nay ev'n my wrongs sit easy.
For one who rhimes to make you easy,
line_2: And his invention strains to please you,

line_1: ADAM alone cou'd not be easy,
line_2: So he must have a wife, an't please ye:

line_1: Upon a plan more plain and easy.
line_2: Tommy has sense to learn, so, please ye,

line_1: Business he deems too hard, trifles too easy,
line_2: And doing nothing finds himself too busy.

line_1: Who made no Wish, but to be easy,
line_2: The bloated Jugg, supine and lazy,

line_1: And too obliging to be easy.
line_2: O'er which to step I'm much to lazy,

line_1: But with my smiles seem'd easy.
line_2: And with love tales did tease me!
